name: Dual Dots - Stay Out Of Line
name_original: Dual Dots - Stay Out Of Line
description:
This game is like endless runner, but in this game your goal is to control two dots the way that dots don't touch to the line. Line is composed of small triangles and because dots stays same distance apart and the line passes between them, you have to turn dots in big control circle without touching the line. You dots moving faster and faster, this make your task very tricky, but small practice and you can make huge progress in your run.

You can even try to record with a friend alternately, it makes the game even more funnier.

You can forget old rule stay in the line, new rule is stay out of line! Little practice and you can become master of two dots, beat your friends and rise to the top of the leaderboard. Have fun!

[ How to play ]
• Turn your dots left or right (swipe with your finger)

[ Features ]
• Easy one finger control
• Great graphics
• Smooth game play
• Leaderboard
